/usr/bin/c++    -std=gnu++11 -lassimp -g   CMakeFiles/PA7.dir/src/camera.cpp.o CMakeFiles/PA7.dir/src/engine.cpp.o CMakeFiles/PA7.dir/src/graphics.cpp.o CMakeFiles/PA7.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/PA7.dir/src/mesh.cpp.o CMakeFiles/PA7.dir/src/object.cpp.o CMakeFiles/PA7.dir/src/planet_object.cpp.o CMakeFiles/PA7.dir/src/shader.cpp.o CMakeFiles/PA7.dir/src/window.cpp.o  -o PA7 -rdynamic -lGLEW -lassimp -lGLU -lGL -Wl,-Bstatic -lSDL2main -Wl,-Bdynamic -lSDL2 -lpthread -lMagick++-6.Q16
